description: Add front matter to important files giving agents explicit instructions (e.g., read-only, do not modify, required context). Prevents accidental changes to critical files.
directives: required-context - Read before working on related code
critical-path - Extra care, review before changes
source-of-truth - Canonical version, sync others from this
benefits: Prevent accidental edits to config files
Guide agents to read context files first
Mark generated files to avoid manual edits
